Articles.Content:
Hello, I am new here to the forum but not the game, been playing it since the old, old versions, and now I need a bit of help, using a ton of different mods, I have come up with a plane design that does not seem to fly right, even trying to get to space...

((Also can not figure out how to put pictures on here from my computer...))

To show pictures, upload your screenshots to a file sharing service like Imgur.com, and copy the link they provide into your posts. 

Welcome to the forum, and maybe we can help after we look at the craft.

2 hours ago, LiamDudas10 said:

Hello, I am new here to the forum but not the game, been playing it since the old, old versions, and now I need a bit of help, using a ton of different mods, I have come up with a plane design that does not seem to fly right, even trying to get to space...

((Also can not figure out how to put pictures on here from my computer...))

@Vanamonde is absolutely correct in that images will help us diagnose your design problems. Also, keep the craft as simple as you can; don't use 400 parts spanning 60 mods to build it IF it is possible to use 120 parts and 2 mods. Sometimes, as noobies, we have a tendency to make it way more complicated than it needs to be.

Hello LiamDudas10 and welcome to the forum!

Happy landings!
